body:
So it's very simple!
The person above you will ask a question starting with "what would you do..." and you answer it. 
Please nothing dirty

Example: Me: What would you do if you got Admin right now?
RandomKid2k15: Ban You. What would you do...
and so on

I'll start

What would you do if you were granted OP On avicus?
body_tagged:
